name: Mayor Quandary: Cute Toys, Ugly Problems
name_original: Mayor Quandary: Cute Toys, Ugly Problems
description:
Play in browser here: https://t2stan.itch.io/mayor-quandary

As the mayor of the Isle of Misfits, use your community app to make tough decisions to ensure all the toys here are happy, hopeful, and stay in good repair. Life doesn't give these ramshackle toys easy answers. They've got serious problems that need your help. Do your best. These toys might get picked up and played with again someday!

Design: Liz Spain
Development: Tristan Stanley, Adrian Benitez Martos
Art: milo moore, Soreiany Khong
Narrative: Liz Spain, zw buckley
Sound: zw buckley
Choir: Xan Farley, Aiden Hilsen, Joey Baleda, Jonathan Day,
Corwin Waldron, Soreiany Khong
